Physical Exam: Examination of the left shoulder and arm
Justification: To assess for any tenderness, swelling, or deformity in the left shoulder and arm.

Physical Exam: Range of motion assessment of the left shoulder and arm
Justification: To assess for any limitation in range of motion of the left shoulder and arm.

Physical Exam: Muscle strength testing of the left shoulder and arm
Justification: To assess for any muscle weakness or atrophy in the left shoulder and arm.

Physical Exam: Neurological examination of the left arm
Justification: To assess for any neurological deficits, such as numbness or tingling, in the left arm.
